name: Mr Bow
description:
Enemies forces is near! Pick up your bow and start shooting.
Mr Bowman is a stickman archer game where you can face many enemies with special bows. Drag and drop aim and shoot arrows at the enemies. A beautiful headshot can completely destroy an enemy or even two. Fight your way to get more and more ancient bows from your ancestor. Prove yourself the ultimate archer of all times.
If you have any questions, feel free to contact us at: http://aceplaymedia.com/contact/
